participant_1.background:
My weekends are for relaxing and spending time with my family.
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
I'm struggling with my parents' distance, but I'm doing well in school.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

participant_2.background:
I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
i have a lot of style.
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
i m getting married in six months.
i read a lot of used books.

content.text: Hey! I'm going to a concert with my friend. How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing great! I am getting married in six months!
Congrats! That's exciting! What style are you thinking for your wedding?
I'm thinking a bohemian style, I love the flowy skirts and dresses.
That sounds beautiful! I love that style too. I recently went to Japan and I was really surprised by how different the culture was to mine.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan! What was your favorite part about the trip?
I loved the food! The sushi was incredible. And the people were so friendly.
I love sushi! I could eat it every day. I'm glad you had a great time!
Thanks! I'm really excited for your wedding! I'm sure it will be beautiful.
